description.oldValue:
Help people in your organization manage their
daily flow of work using a customized landing experience in Teams that displays
the most important tasks, tools, news, and resources in one central place. The
new landing experience offers expanded navigational tools between Viva apps and
acts as the home base for Viva experiences in Teams.
description.newValue: Help people in your organization manage their daily flow of work using a customized landing experience in Teams that displays the most important tasks, tools, news, and resources in one central place. The new landing experience offers expanded navigational tools between Viva apps.
